atk_abil: Normal Attack: Jumps and fires multiple magic arrows that damages and knocks back enemy.
Skill Attack: Fires multiple magic arrows into the sky, creating a rain of arrows that damages and knocks back enemy.
Special Ability 1: Increases the game speed by 6%, movement speed of Elf units by 3% and attack range by 4%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000

Weaken Crystal (Elf): Upon reviving as an Elf, the enemy's crystal HP on the stage battle is partly reduced. Reduced by 1% for every 5-star unit and 2% for every 6 star unit. Applied even when in Time Shop, and the unit's maximum crystal HP cannot be reduced by more than 20%.

Additional Attack (High Elf Archer): With the command of the Mystic Archer, the chance of the [High Elf Archer] making an additional cast will increase. Increases the efficiency by 1% per 5-star unit and 3% per 6-star unit. Applies even when the unit is in time shop and effects can be increased up to 30%.
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Jumps and fires multiple magic arrows that damages and knocks back enemy.
Skill Attack: Fires multiple magic arrows into the sky, creating a rain of arrows that damages and knocks back enemy.
Special Ability 1: Increases the game speed by 12%, movement speed of Elf units by 7% and attack range by 8%.
Special Ability 2: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 3: Unaffected by attacks by terrain above stage 10,000
Special Ability 5: Never gets disturbed by enemy's attacks. Never gets paralyzed. Never gets stunned.

Weaken Crystal (Elf): Upon reviving as an Elf, the enemy's crystal HP on the stage battle is partly reduced. Reduced by 1% for every 5-star unit and 2% for every 6 star unit. Applied even when in Time Shop, and the unit's maximum crystal HP cannot be reduced by more than 20%.

Additional Attack (High Elf Archer): With the command of the Mystic Archer, the chance of the [High Elf Archer] making an additional cast will increase. Increases the efficiency by 1% per 5-star unit and 3% per 6-star unit. Applies even when the unit is in time shop and effects can be increased up to 30%.
